entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLI - dotnet workload restore fails on solution if there is a .esproj project #44587
  • Why does dotnet publish include files like Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll? #44579
  • Errors occur when run dotnet cli on Windows with sudo. #44576

Closed

  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch kills process tree on windows and does not let DCP cleanup containers #44542
    9.0.2xx
  • The Visual Studio version displays incorrectly on the SDK installer page. #44360

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase Arm64 test build timeout #44595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Agent sharing #44588
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Refactor source build tests to used common extracted sdk #44568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Prevent propagation of Ctrl+C to child processes #44565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove source build warn on diff test infra #44569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Forward port: Fix .net8 template #42635
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
